topic.title: Quality of Content
topic.shortdesc: This section evaluates the content of the project in three areas: clarity, style, and acuracy.

ul.li:
Successes
Overall, the project provided very good content. There were a few mistakes, but nothing too glaring.

Areas of Improvement
Video stuff mentions in docs file, missing short descriptions, wordiness of bullet points (especially on the membership age), unnecessary arrow and slash found at the bottom of intramural sports page, and whatever else you guys want to add here!
